nws.name: Overnight
nws.detailedForecast: Sleet and freezing rain and rain showers. Cloudy. Low around 25, with temperatures rising to around 29 overnight. Wind chill values as low as 18. Northeast wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

nws.name: Saturday
nws.detailedForecast: Sleet and freezing rain and a slight chance of snow showers. Cloudy. High near 26, with temperatures falling to around 21 in the afternoon. Wind chill values as low as 8. North northeast wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

nws.name: Saturday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Sleet before 3am, then sleet and a slight chance of snow showers. Cloudy, with a low around 15. Wind chill values as low as 0. North wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 2 inches possible. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

nws.name: Sunday
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow showers and a chance of sleet. Mostly cloudy. High near 22, with temperatures falling to around 19 in the afternoon. Wind chill values as low as 0. North northwest wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.

nws.name: Sunday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 9. North northwest wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

nws.name: Monday
nws.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 28, with temperatures falling to around 23 in the afternoon. Northwest wind 5 to 10 mph.

nws.name: Monday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 10. West southwest wind around 5 mph.

nws.name: Tuesday
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 41. South southwest wind 5 to 10 mph.

nws.name: Tuesday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 20. Southwest wind around 5 mph.

nws.name: Wednesday
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 41.

nws.name: Wednesday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 23.

nws.name: Thursday
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 43.

nws.name: Thursday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 27.

nws.name: Friday
nws.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Rain And Snow Showers
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain and snow showers after noon. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 37. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.
